name: CrazyCrowd
tag_list: tickets, concerts, sports, theatre, festivals, gigs, tours, compare-tickets
overview:
CrazyCrowd.co.uk is a ticket comparison site that brings you to the enjoying and fun-filled world of entertainment. We gather all legitimate ticket providers and our goal is to help you get to the concert of your idol in no fuss. We will also keep you posted with upcoming concerts, gigs, tours, musicals, drama, theatre, comedy and sporting events of local and international stars in the UK. Right in the comfort of your very home, you can look for the details of different concert events such as date, venue, and ticket prices with corresponding seat location. CrazyCrowd.co.uk comparison is for free so you can browse all concert details of your favorite stars!

CrazyCrowd.co.uk don’t sell tickets but brings you concert, sports, theatre, festival tickets at the price right for you. Our mission is to help fans find tickets, compare prices and buy tickets at the best prices available online. CrazyCrowd.co.uk does this by listing as many available and legitimate event tickets as they can find online.
